name: OofClicker (fun project)
description:
OofClicker - One of quadrillions clicker games.

(but its bad)

Currently in early development, not really beautiful and don't has a lot of functions.

Currently included:

 - Click-Button

- Mega Oof Upgrade (+1 Oof per click)

- Save and load

v1.0.2 - Small UI changes
